wikipedia_page.main: Simon Brooke Mackay, Baron Tanlaw (born 30 March 1934) is a former member of the House of Lords.

response: * Simon Mackay, Baron Tanlaw (born 1934), member of the House of Lords
Inchcape is a nephew of the life peer Simon Mackay, Baron Tanlaw.
*Simon Mackay, Baron Tanlaw (born 1934)TANLAW, Simon Brooke Mackay, Baron cr 1971 (Life Peer) in Who's Who 2007 (London, A. & C. Black, 2007)

link_mentions.page: Kenneth James William Mackay, 3rd Earl of Inchcape
response: Inchcape was the son of Kenneth Mackay, 2nd Earl of Inchcape, and his first wife Joan Moriarty, daughter of John Francis Moriarty, Lord Justice of the Irish Court of Appeal.  His half-brother on his father's side was the life peer Simon Mackay, Baron Tanlaw.
